author: marvin
msg: Copy the release checklist section from releasemanagement.xml.

author: marvin
msg: Note that the scope does not include summarizing release policy or
serving as a repository for best practices -- two ambitions which
contribute greatly to the bloat of releasemanagment.xml.

author: marvin
msg: Change the mission of the Experimental Release Guide.
Instead of dedicating itself solely to describing the 2013
Alternate Release Procedure, release.xml will now be a DRAFT
aiming to supersede ye olde crufty Release Management Guide
entirely -- allowing the addition of non-alternate-procedure
